price: 49. Nummah Nabii Muusah tawraat kitab necee, kay mari tirri elle iyyamkeh.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَا مُوسَى ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَهۡتَدُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ātaynā mūsā al-kitāba laʿallahum yahtadūna
